CarbonFix Standard (CFS) bụ atụmatụ iji kwado ọrụ okpomọkụ iji gbochie carbon na ikuku
CarbonFix Standard bụ nke CarbonFix, otu na-enweghị uru nke dị na Germany, na-achịkwa
N'afọ 2012, ọ nwetara ya ma tinye ya na Gold Standard.
E hiwere njikọ CarbonFix na afọ 1999
N'afọ 2007, njikọ ahụ mepụtara ụdị mbụ nke CarbonFix Standard, nke e gosipụtara na World Climate Conference na Bali, na ọnwa Disemba afọ 2007.
Ọkọlọtọ ahụ nwere njirisi nke ọrụ oke ọhịa ga-emerịrị iji nweta asambodo
